concept.title: PEW Distribution A/B Setup — LUFP7 (A060)

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Procedure to set up PEW distribution A/B using LUFP7 A060 module including wiring and checks.

othermeta.name: entities
othermeta.content: PEW Distribution A;LUFP7 A060;terminal blocks;cablink;power rails;fuses

othermeta.name: usecase
othermeta.content: Guide technicians through PEW distribution A/B setup with LUFP7 A060 module.

conbody.p:
The RX and TX Modbus signals have the Profibus addresses:
RX = 231
TX = 232
conbody.note: Bits that are not mentioned are reserved.

table.title: PEW Distribution A/B Setup — LUFP7 (A060) — IM400 (A051)

entry.p:
Bit 1 - Status. This bit is set for any of the following states:
Active alarm
Active preventive alarm
Alarm acknowledged
First measurement

Bit 13 - System error. This bit is set for the following states:
Disconnected injection
Over voltage
Over capacitance
Bit 14 - Reality error. This bit is set for auto test failure state.

table.title: PEW Distribution A/B Setup — LUFP7 (A060) — IFL12MC (A030)
PEW Distribution A/B Setup — LUFP7 (A060) — IFL12MC (A031)
PEW Distribution A/B Setup — LUFP7 (A060) — IFL12MC (A032)
